sentences.sContent: We have similar tastes in music.
sentences.sCn: 我们对音乐的品位相近。

sentences.sContent: Both approaches seem to achieve similar results.
sentences.sCn: 两种方法都得出了相似的结果。

sentences.sContent: A number of his friends had been affected in a similar way .
sentences.sCn: 他的一些朋友也受到了类似的影响。

sentences.sContent: The two products look quite similar .
sentences.sCn: 这两种产品看上去很相似。

sentences.sContent: ...have similar expectations of their children despite different 	ways of parenting...
...A steady stream of similar headlines accuse the net and its offspring apps...
...and it is then transported to a vacant parking space by a computer-controlled device similar to an elevator that also runs sideways...
...If private plans demanded similar productivity savings from providers...
...The House bill has no similar tax...
...had a similar experience to Cutting's in another Paris museum...
...Professor Weber believes that environmental policy can make use of similar tactics...
...happy people with little or no sense of meaning in life are found to be similar to those suffering from chronic adversity...
...We feel something similar to a sense of ownership when we hold things in our hand...
...You can imagine similar kinds of interactive activities along historical lines...

phrases.pCn: 相似图形；相似形（similar figure的复数）

remMethod.val: simil(相类似) ＋ ar → 相似的
